Skill Statement: Communicate findings of financial investigations effectively both in written and oral situations, including providing testimony as an expert witness in court.
Standards: NICE_SP_DEV; NICE_SP_ARC; NICE_SP_SYS; NICE_AN_TWA; NICE_AN_EXP; NICE_AN_ASA; NICE_AN_TGT; NICE_AN_LNG; NICE_CO_OPS; NICE_IN_INV

RSD Name: Fraud Capture Program and System Creation
Skill Statement: Create programs and systems that catch fraud early.
Standards: NICE_SP_DEV; NICE_SP_ARC; NICE_SP_SYS; NICE_AN_TWA; NICE_AN_EXP; NICE_AN_ASA; NICE_AN_TGT; NICE_AN_LNG; NICE_CO_OPS; NICE_IN_INV

RSD Name: Limited Environment Financial Accounting Role Identification
Skill Statement: Identify the role of financial accounting and accounting standards in a limited environment to meet an organizational need.

RSD Name: Structured Environment Financial Accounting Role Identification
Skill Statement: Determine the role of financial accounting to address a specific requirement.

RSD Name: Accrual Basis Nonexchange Revenue Amount Calculation
Skill Statement: Determine nonexchange revenue recognition for state and local governments in accordance with the modified accrual basis of accounting.
Calculate the amount of nonexchange revenue to be recognized by state and local governments using the accrual basis of accounting.

RSD Name: Accrual Basis Nonexchange Revenue Journal Entries Preparation
Skill Statement: Prepare journal entries for the amount of nonexchange revenue to be recognized by state and local governments using the accrual basis of accounting.
Determine the appropriate funds that a state or local government should use to record its activities.
Keywords: Accounting; Budgeting; Operating Budget; Governmental Accounting

Skill Statement: Prepare worksheets to convert governmental fund statements to government-wide activities.
Recall the disclosure requirements for the notes to the basic financial statements of state and local governments.
Prepare the statement of changes in fiduciary net position for state or local government fiduciary funds using trial balances and documentation.

RSD Name: Fiduciary Funds Net Position Statement Preparation
Skill Statement: Prepare the statement of net position for the fiduciary funds of a state or local government from trial balances and supporting documentation.
Calculate the fund balances for state and local governments.
Identify capital assets reported in the government-wide financial statements of state and local governments.
Determine pension expense in governmental funds.
Identify criteria established for government reporting entities.
Prepare the balance sheet for the governmental funds of a state or local government from trial balances and supporting documentation.
Prepare the governmental funds statement of revenues, expenditures, and fund balance changes using trial balances and supporting documentation.
Identify general and proprietary long-term liabilities reported in the government-wide financial statements.

RSD Name: Modified Accrual Basis Nonexchange Revenue Journal Entries Preparation
Skill Statement: Prepare journal entries for nonexchange revenue recognition in state and local governments under the modified accrual basis.

RSD Name: Net General Capital Assets Balance Journal Entries Preparation
Skill Statement: Prepare journal entries for the net general capital assets balance for state and local governments.

RSD Name: Net General Capital Assets Balances Calculation
Skill Statement: Calculate the net general capital assets balance for state and local governments.
Calculate the net position balances for state and local governments.

RSD Name: Proprietary Funds Cash Flows Statement Preparation
Skill Statement: Prepare the statement of cash flows for the proprietary funds of a state or local government.

RSD Name: Proprietary Funds Net Position Statement Preparation
Skill Statement: Prepare the statement of net position for the proprietary funds of a state or local government from trial balances and supporting documentation.
Calculate expenditures to be recognized under the modified accrual basis of accounting for state and local governments.
Calculate expenses to be recognized under the accrual basis of accounting for state and local governments.
Calculate amounts for other financing sources and uses in governmental fund statements.
Create procurement policies to select qualified suppliers.
Review a company's financial statements to make economic decisions.
Keywords: Analysis; Decision Making; Finance; Financial Statement Analysis; Financial Statement

Skill Statement: Analyze a company's financial statements to make economic decisions.
Keywords: Analysis; Decision Making; Finance; Financial Statement Analysis; Financial Statement

Skill Statement: Use financial records to report a company's business activities and performance.
Keywords: Financial Statements; Cash Flow; Balance Sheets; Income Statements; Cash Flow Statements

Skill Statement: Record financial transactions.
Verify the integrity of account balances on a company's general ledger.
Close temporary financial accounts at the end of each month to prepare accurate reporting.
Ensure that two sets of records are in agreement.
Examine a company's cash inflows and outflows during a specific period to generate a financial report.
Keywords: Analysis; Cash Flow Analysis; Cash Flow; Financial Report

Skill Statement: Implement proper accounting methods and policies to ensure positive overall company financial health, including financial analysis of budget to actual variances, forecasts, projections, and year-end statements.
Keywords: Management; Accounting; Budgeting; Finance; Forecasting; Financial Analysis; Account Management

Skill Statement: Record a business's transactions using the double-entry bookkeeping method.
Keywords: Accounting; General Ledger; General Ledger Accounting; General Ledger (GL) Accounting
